about_the_game:
At the turn of the century, the United States of America is shaken by the march of progress – airplanes, telegraph, telephone lines, automobiles, photography, so, all of this electrifies minds and changes destinies. Henry Morgan, who worked as a pilot instructor in a flying school, conceived the impossible – to build an airplane capable of flying from Washington to Mexico without breaks. But what awaits Henry on this journey? Fame, immeasurable wealth, or love, which cannot be destroyed by time or distance?

As a result of intrigues and a chain of coincidences, the first intercontinental flight in the history of mankind, which began as a heroic adventure, turns into an epic of romantic events, seductions, and revelations that Henry Morgan must experience just one step away from paradise. But will Henry take the most important step of his life and soar to the shining peaks of bliss? And if he does, with whom?

The game is filled with bright and stylish locations in the colors of the era, an engaging storyline with unpredictable twists, distinctive characters, and captivating animations. As you immerse yourself in the game, it's not hard to find yourself one step away from paradise.

Main characters:

  • Henry Morgan
The main character of the visual novel "One Step From Paradise". At the beginning of the story, Henry works as a flight instructor at a flight school, understands well the construction of airplanes, and dreams not only of building a machine capable of flying from Washington to Mexico, but also of making this flight without stops or refueling.


  • Elizabeth Miller

The fiancée of Henry Morgan, a sweet and intelligent girl whose family is in a difficult situation: her father's business assets are in danger due to the machinations of a local rich man. To save her family's money, Elizabeth is forced to sacrifice her honor and marry Henry Morgan, a poor man who is not loved by her. As a result of this arranged marriage, the Miller family hopes to save their assets, while the Morgan family hopes to improve their financial situation.


  • Mister Ralph

Mister Ralph is a real business shark, the richest man in the state, known for his tightfistedness and disdain for people who are not able to multiply their wealth. He invests in enterprises only when he is one hundred percent sure of profits, tries to foresee all the details, and leaves nothing to chance.


The latest computer game in the genre of virtual anime visual novel about love, adventure, intrigue, and human progress!
